about_the_game: The original game has limited skins, "1 for gangsters and 2 for police man", Buying this DLC allows you to unlock all available (40) and future skins.

content_descriptors.notes:
Players fight each other using guns,
There is cartoony blood and gore during fights.

Players do some illegal stuff like stealing money or selling drugs but again in a funny and competitive way.

detailed_description: The original game has limited skins, "1 for gangsters and 2 for police man", Buying this DLC allows you to unlock all available (40) and future skins.
name: Who Run The City: Multiplayer - Skins Pack

package_groups.name: default
